answers.answer: At 34 weeks my baby was measuring about 6lbs too. He was in the 90th percentile. Im nervous I'll have a big baby but hoping maybe he will show up early.
At 34 weeks mine was at 6 pounds n now at 37 weeks they say somewhere around 7 pounds but we are almost there :)
I am 37 weeks and haven't gotten a scan for baby's weight, I have absolutely no idea where she is on the scale and it's driving me nuts

My doctor doesn't want to give me a ultrasound to see how big the baby is n I'm 35 weeks it makes me so angry ! I'm going to go to my appointment on Friday n demand I get a ultrasound to make sure everything is ok in there ! I cry if I have to ! Lol

Me to cindy0624!! My doc is checking me tmr for the strep b and if she tells me no for another ulyrasound im going to be so firm with her. I want to know how much he weighs, if hes dropped, if hes head down... If im dilated. I wanna know!
I am 36 weeks and baby weighs 6 pounds 2 ounces.
I'm 37 weeks and my baby is estimated to weigh 7lbs 9oz. The midwife told me not to worry as they are usually wrong. They can be 1-2lbs out.
At 35 weeks my baby was 5lb 15oz..Had a scan today at 37+6 weeks and baby is now 6lb 11oz...getting induced on monday
35 weeks & my baby is estimated to weigh 5 pounds 14oz
Wow my baby is small then ! .. lol monday at my 35 week & 1 day appointment My baby was 4pounds 15ounces
At my 34 week ultrasound doctor predicted she weighs 5 pounds 10 ounces.

That's actually a good sign. I wasn't scheduled till 36 weeks to have a growth scan but I hsve preeclampsia and they know I'll have to be induced early. Take that as a good sign! I'm sure they will do yours soon!
Oh and baby is 34 weeks estimated 5 lbs 10 oz
I'm 36 weeks, just had a ultrasound today and my baby's measuring 8.6 pound
Was 6 pounds 13 ounces at 36 week growth scan. 37 now and being induced (unrelated to weight) first week of June if she doesnt come before then!

question: Just had my scan and my baby is estimated at 6.9 pounds! !!! What are your estimations? ?
title: 35 week scan
